DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study help determine route woman receive hormonal contraception cause different change occur line vagina . The investigator plan compare oral route ( take birth control pill ) vaginal route ( use vaginal ring ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator intend conduct prospective , randomize study Oregon Health Science University . This study conduct six 28-day cycle . Subjects enrol study undergo baseline vaginal biopsy randomize receive either intravaginal ethinyl estradiol etonogestrel ( NuvaRing® ) oral ethinyl estradiol desogestrel ( Desogen® ) . Repeat vaginal biopsy obtain three six month exposure either oral intravaginal hormonal contraception . These analyzed measure thickness vaginal epithelium quantify presence Langerhans cell , macrophage , T-lymphocytes dendritic cell .
DOC.criteria: Female 1835 year In general good health With regular menses ( every 2832 day ) Seeking contraception willing use hormonal method least 6 month Current recent ( within past 8 week ) vaginitis pelvic inflammatory disease History recurrent vaginitis ( > 2 episode one year , type ) Pregnancy Recent use hormonal contraceptive Depot medroxyprogesterone : 6 month Progestin implant : 3 month Oral contraceptive : 3 month Hormone impregnate IUD : 3 month Contraindications use oral contraceptive pill vaginal ring History deep vein thrombosis Known coagulopathy thrombophilia Unexplained vaginal bleeding Uncontrolled hypertension Diabetes vascular change Present history hepatic disease liver tumor Migraines neurologic change Myocardial infection Pulmonary embolus Stroke Breast cancer Hypersensitivity allergy hormonal contraception Heavy Smoking ( ≥ 15 cigarette per day )
